verses.text: And all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H5414"\w*; and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and against \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*: and the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Would \w God|strong="H3863"\w* that we had \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*! or would \w God|strong="H3863"\w* we had \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in this \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*!

And wherefore hath the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* us unto this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, that our \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* and our \w children|strong="H2945"\w* should be a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*? were it not \w better|strong="H2896"\w* for us to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, Let us \w make|strong="H5414"\w* a \w captain|strong="H7218"\w*, and let us \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

Then \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* all the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*, \add which were\add* of them that \w searched|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* their \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*:

And they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w company|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which we \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* through to \w search|strong="H8446"\w* it, \add is\add* an \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

If the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* in us, then he will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* us into this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it us; a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which \w floweth|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

Only \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* not ye against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, neither \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* ye the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; for they \add are\add* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* for us: their \w defence|strong="H6738"\w* is \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from them, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* with us: \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* them not.  +  r 14.9  t defence: Heb. shadow *

But all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w bade|strong="H0559"\w* \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* them with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*. And the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* before all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, How long will this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w provoke|strong="H5006"\w* me? and how long will it be \w ere|strong="H3808"\w* they \w believe|strong="H0539"\w* me, for all the \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* which I have \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them?

I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, and \w disinherit|strong="H3423"\w* them, and will \w make|strong="H6213"\w* of thee a \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* and \w mightier|strong="H6099"\w* than they.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Then the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, (for thou broughtest \w up|strong="H5927"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in thy \w might|strong="H3581"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them;)

And they will \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \add it\add* to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \add for\add* they have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that thou 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add art\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that thou 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* art \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w face|strong="H5869"\w* to \w face|strong="H5869"\w*, and \add that\add* thy \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* over them, and \add that\add* thou \w goest|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, by day \w time|strong="H3119"\w* in a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and in a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

¶ Now \add if\add* thou shalt \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \add all\add* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, then the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w fame|strong="H8088"\w* of thee will \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them, therefore he hath \w slain|strong="H7819"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And now, I beseech thee, let the \w power|strong="H3581"\w* of my \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* be \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, \w according|strong="H0834"\w* as thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w longsuffering|strong="H0750"\w*, and of \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, \w forgiving|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* and \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, and by no \w means|strong="H5352"\w* \w clearing|strong="H5352"\w* \add the guilty\add*, \w visiting|strong="H6485"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* unto the \w third|strong="H8029"\w* and \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* \add generation\add*.

\w Pardon|strong="H5545"\w*, I beseech thee, the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* according unto the \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w* of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, and as thou hast \w forgiven|strong="H5375"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* even until \w now|strong="H2008"\w*.\f + \fr 14.19 \ft until…: or, hitherto\f*
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w pardoned|strong="H5545"\w* according to thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*:

But \add as\add* \w truly|strong="H0199"\w* \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Because all those \w men|strong="H0582"\w* which have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, and my \w miracles|strong="H0226"\w*, which I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* and in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and have \w tempted|strong="H5254"\w* me now these \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* to my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*;

Surely they shall \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, neither shall any of them that \w provoked|strong="H5006"\w* me \w see|strong="H7200"\w* it:\f + \fr 14.23 \ft Surely…: Heb. If they see the land\f*

But my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*, \w because|strong="H6118"\w* he had \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* with him, and hath \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* me \w fully|strong="H4390"\w*, him will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whereinto he \w went|strong="H0935"\w*; and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

(Now the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w* and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*.) To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* you, and \w get|strong="H5265"\w* you into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

How long \add shall I bear with\add* this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, which \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against me? I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w murmurings|strong="H8519"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which they \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against me.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \add  \+w As truly as|strong="H3808"\+w*\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as ye have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, so will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to you:

Your \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in this \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; and all that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of you, according to your whole \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, which have \w murmured|strong="H3885"\w* against me,

Doubtless ye shall \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add concerning\add* which I \w sware|strong="H3027"\w* to make you \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* therein, save \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.\f + \fr 14.30 \ft sware: Heb. lifted up my hand\f*

But your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, which ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w* should be a \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*, them will I bring \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which ye have \w despised|strong="H3988"\w*.
But \add as for\add* you, your \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w*, they shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in this \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w wander|strong="H7462"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* your \w whoredoms|strong="H2184"\w*, until your \w carcases|strong="H6297"\w* be \w wasted|strong="H8552"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 14.33 \ft wander: or, feed\f*

After the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* in which ye \w searched|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add even\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, each \w day|strong="H3117"\w* for a \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, shall ye \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \add even\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* my breach of \w promise|strong="H8569"\w*.\f + \fr 14.34 \ft breach…: or, altering of my purpose\f*

I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, I will \w surely|strong="H0518"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H2063"\w* unto all this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, that are gathered \w together|strong="H3259"\w* against me: in this \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* they shall be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*, and there they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w search|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, who \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and made all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* to \w murmur|strong="H3885"\w* against him, by bringing \w up|strong="H3318"\w* a \w slander|strong="H1681"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*,

Even \w those|strong="H0582"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that did bring \w up|strong="H3318"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w report|strong="H1681"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w died|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*, \add which were\add* of the \w men|strong="H1992"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* to \w search|strong="H8446"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w lived|strong="H2421"\w* \add still\add*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* these \w sayings|strong="H1697"\w* unto all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*.

¶ And they rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and gat them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Lo|strong="H2009"\w*, we \add be here\add*, and will go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w promised|strong="H0559"\w*: for we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherefore now do ye \w transgress|strong="H5674"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? but it shall not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*.

Go not \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* not \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you; that ye be not \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

For the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w* and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \add are\add* there \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you, and ye shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: because ye are \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H0310"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, therefore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will not be with you.

But they \w presumed|strong="H6075"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w*: nevertheless the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w departed|strong="H4185"\w* not \w out|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

Then the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in that \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, and \w discomfited|strong="H3807"\w* them, \add even\add* unto \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*.
